translations: n.信号传送器；传送者（transmitter 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 压力变送器；压力传送器
能级传送器；液面传感器；物位变送器
流量变送器；流量传送仪；流量传感器

sentences.sentence: Within their compact bodies these minute satellites are able to house sensors and communications receivers/transmitters that enable operators to study Earth from space, as well as space around Earth.
sentences.translation: 这些微型卫星体积小巧，能够容纳传感器和通信接收器、发射机，使操作人员能够从太空中研究地球以及地球周围的空间。

sentences.sentence: The transmitters will send a signal automatically to a local base station.
sentences.translation: 发射台会自动将信号发送到地方基站。

sentences.sentence: Transmitters emit waves of a certain frequency in the direction of the target.
sentences.translation: 发射器朝目标方向发射一定频率的无线电波。
